sentences.sContent: We should have the test results back within 24 hours.
sentences.sCn: 我们24小时之内应该可以拿到化验结果。

sentences.sContent: He fell sick and died within a matter of weeks.
sentences.sCn: 他病倒了，不出几星期就死了。

sentences.sContent: Within an hour of our arrival Caroline was starting to complain.
sentences.sCn: 我们到达还没有一小时，卡罗琳就开始抱怨了。

sentences.sContent: The real dangers to these rebels came from within.
sentences.sCn: 对于这些叛乱分子真正的危险来自内部。

trans.tranOther: before a certain period of time has passed
